discussion.p: There are 27 instances of &sb and one instance of &rhs in Clause , each of which needs to use addressof because the operand has a user-provided template type parameter as an associated class and so the use of unary & is subject to ADL hijacking.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4750.
